bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model

Class VoronoiEdge

  • java.lang.Object
    • bio.singa.mathematics.algorithms.voronoi.model.VoronoiEdge
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    LineSegment

    public class VoronoiEdge
extends java.lang.Object
implements LineSegment
    The edges of voronoi diagrams. A left and right side is assigned to each edge, as well as its starting and ending point. The direction of the line is considered as follows (relative to the left side): 
     upward: left.x lt right.x
 downward: left.x gt right.x
 horizontal: left.x == right.x
 upward: left.x lt right.x
 rightward: left.y lt right.y
 leftward: left.y gt right.y
 vertical: left.y == right.y
